text:
Hey Steve, I hope you're well!

Sorry for the delay in replying had a few personal issues this last week. I will be faster from now on!

I'm currently a third year on at the University of South Wales (Cardiff Based), I study Visual Effects and Motion Graphics and hope to work in comp! I will be finishing in May (project wise) and (hopefully :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing:) graduating in July!

I had a look at the links you sent me and what you've done is super inspiring and very impressive!! I'm super excited to get to know you and talk about industry stuff!

Currently I'm working on two projects, the first is my final major project where we can do whatever we want- I've decided to work on a 3 shot advertisement which incorporates all the basic comp skills to show perspective employers I can do them well! My other project is basically working on my portfolio where we need to make a showreel and a decent online portfolio for recruiters to find and be impressed by!

My Linkedin is here: <https://www.linkedin.com/in/beckyshaw/> and Vimeo: <https://vimeo.com/beckyshaw>
My old showreel is here (working on a new one at the min with much better stuff hahah!): <https://vimeo.com/321352410>

text: Good stuff Becky.  Glad you liked the links I sent. Don't hesitate to ask questions.
